<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Channel the Godmind](/Feats.aspx?ID=7217) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 55

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Aeonbound](/Feats.aspx?ID=7195)

</column>

---

You tap into the collective consciousness of the Godmind, the governing entity of axiomite society, to rapidly parse near-infinite variables to read your surroundings. For 1 minute, you gain precise motion sense out to 60 feet, you can see invisible creatures and objects, and you gain the benefits of [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) (with a counteract check modifier equal to your Perception modifier).
name: Channel the Godmind
